thread.title: Ubisoft vows to remain independent as Vivendi’s equity stake grows

title: Ubisoft vows to remain independent as Vivendi’s equity stake grows
text:
Ubisoft vows to remain independent as Vivendi’s equity stake grows 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Ubisoft has responded to publisher Vivendi's recent purchase of a large number of its company shares, criticizing the move as "unsolicited" ...
